description: This file defines the interface 'IFbSettings' for the FbSettings component within the WPEFramework. It specifies methods for handling device and system settings such as device name, SKU, country code, timezone, and event subscriptions related to these settings.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: An interface for Facebook Settings, providing methods to get/set device information, system configurations, and event subscriptions.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Register or unregister application event notifications for Firebolt notifier bridge.

methods.name: GetCountryCode
methods.description: Retrieve the current country code setting.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe from country code change events.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe from timezone change events.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieve the friendly name for second screen.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe from friendly name change events.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe from device name change events.
